rules.content: Whenever you gain life, you may pay{lns}{2}. If you do, exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a 1/1 white Cat creature in addition to its other types.

tags.setting: On the steps of a healing temple, a glowing white cat absorbs streams of golden energy while miniature cat spirits leap from nearby memorial urns to join its side.
